TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DesignerOptionService/DesignerOptionCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type DesignerOptionService.DesignerOptionCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 包含設計工具選項的集合。

span.span: Contains a collection of designer options.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是包含其他集合物件。The class is a collection that contains other objects. 這會形成樹狀結構的選項，與每個分支都包含名稱和可能的屬性集合的樹狀結構。This forms a tree of options, with each branch of the tree having a name and a possible collection of properties. 樹狀結構的每個父分支包含的所有子分支內容的聯集。Each parent branch of the tree contains a union of the properties of all the child branches.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會直接從傳遞給的值方法並遭到包裝在隱藏的值物件，從使用者的額外的屬性描述元。 objects are taken directly from the value passed to the method and are wrapped in an additional property descriptor that hides the value object from the user. 這表示任何值都可能會傳遞至`component`參數的各種方法。This means that any value may be passed into the `component` parameter of the various methods. 值無法辨識，並在內部取代為正確的值。The value is not recognized and is replaced with the correct value internally.
